attributes.action: List ALL Crime Figures on Crimes Committed by Non-Doms against ALL other Crime, Monthly from 2002
attributes.additional_details:
-List ALL Crime Figures on Crimes Committed by Non-Doms against ALL other Crime, Monthly from 2002 -

With reference to the Crime figures being dumbed down, we need to ask the question 'Why are they being dumbed down?'.

Immigration is one issue, but if there is a relation in Crime figures to immigration, we need the government to publish monthly figures against immigration and deportation figures to prove to us the truth behind Crime Committed year on year from 2002 and constantly moving forward.

If British people are and I quote, 'Mainly law abiding citizens' then these figures would prove that and clearly indicate where and why these figures have been dumbed down.

Publish Non-Dom Crime figures now!
